title: Favorite Quotes – Anton Meier Ebsen Jørgensen
description: A curated list of my favorite quotes – humor, faith, discipline, learning, and life.

hero.title: My Favorite Quotes
hero.text: Small lines, big impact. Quotes I use as mental shortcuts for discipline, learning, faith, humor, and perspective.

note.title: Note
note.text1: I keep them short and useful. If a quote requires an entire Wikipedia page to make sense, it typically doesn't make the cut.
note.text2: Tip: Always record the source and context — your future self will thank you.

cta.title: Send a quote
cta.text: If you send me a quote, please include: (1) author/source, (2) theme, (3) why it resonates with you.
